msg: we miss configure(Props) in LogStreamfactory so workaround for a known property, we can desire to do it for few more and maybe use a ThreadLocal but it would be a as poor solution as today

author: stsp
msg: Fix issue #4513: 'svn auth' shouldn't treat argv patterns as URLs.
(svn_cl__auth): Convert arguments to UTF-8 but otherwise leave them
unchanged. Prevents patterns from being mangled by URL canonicalisation.
